info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Berkshire, northeastern Columbia and southeastern Rensselaer Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stephentown, or 9 miles east of Nassau, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Hancock, New Ashford, Berkshire, Lanesborough, East Nassau, Garfield, North Stephentown, West Stephentown, North Hancock, Lakeview Terrace, The Boulders, Adams Junction, Yankee Orchards, Stearnsville, New Lebanon Center, West Lebanon and Dunham Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts...and east central New York.
